website_summaries.verdict: More than just arch supports, these socks give compression at the ankle, heel and arch to help relieve pain. They don't come with a specific arch support pad, but you can combine them with orthotics or insoles.
pros: Provide relief from pain caused by plantar fasciitis, edema, arthritis, and injuries
Lightweight foot brace with graduated compression at ankle, heel and arch
Improves circulation, reduces swelling, provides therapeutic pressure
Can combine with orthotics, insoles, splints and taping
cons: Should provide compression, but not leave an imprint that lasts more than an hour

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief!
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from acute plantar fasciitis, I put these on and felt an immediate relief. I was in disbelief that they would actually help. But they do! With the help of rest, ice and these socks I’m able to function. Definitely worth the money and true to size. I wear a 9-9.5 US women’s. I bought the medium and the fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Extra support after broken ankle and torn tendon
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for general compression support and "foot energy." I bought them for use under a lace-up splint/wrap when transitioning out of a fracture boot after a broken ankle and torn tendon injury. Size / sizing: I have long, narrow, flatish feet (size 11 women's) and the LARGE fit well. I wear them on both feet since my "good" ankle gets extra pressure. I expect to wear these by themselves in summer and over socks in winter for the foreseeable future since they help support my ankles. One heads-up: they are most comfortable when standing and walking -- they can feel constricting when just sitting. Also, if you have bunions you may need to slide the front back behind them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Gombrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Product does what is says great support for Plantar Fascitis or Heel Spur
customer_reviews.text: So like my new compression ankle socks....I have had a heel spur on my left heel since the 80's however, now that I am walking more, I needed to give it some more support...your socks were the answer...I love Amazon...because I don't like to go from store to store to find something...it is generally all the same anyway...Amazon gives me access to alot of vendors such as yourself..keep up the good work...I wear a size 10 shoe and did order the size M and they worked out just fine, so I would say true to size...
customer_reviews.author: AZ Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: I always read bad reviews first because we all know that 5 star ...
customer_reviews.text: I always read bad reviews first because we all know that 5 star reviews are usually someone being paid. But- these are incredible! I have a bad case of plantar fasciitis in my left foot. I tried the frozen water bottle trick, stretching, the annoying boot thing.... Nothing worked. Until these socks! I work 50hrs a week in a restaurant, running around like crazy. It got to the point I could barely stand for more than an hour without needing a break. I bought these, and feel like I have brand new feet! I highly recommend them for anyone dealing with pain. I wear a size 10womens. The medium are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good compression & support, affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I have Plantar Fasciitis. Yes, I have a sprained ankle. Yes, I have to walk a lot at work. I have other socks like this, but I've worn them out from use. I purchased these because they seemed to offer more compression and support to the ankle since these are taller. How have they performed? I have been happy with the performance of these socks. They are tight enough to offer good compression while still flexible enough to be able to easily put them on and take them off. They offer good support and reduce pain in my feet and ankles and they still allow complete range of motion. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Stone Dog

customer_reviews.title: cuts off circulation and leaves welts
customer_reviews.text: Elastic at the top and bottom is too tight and cuts off my circulation, leaving heavy welts, and making my toes numb. These might fit if you have extremely thin legs, weigh 100 lbs and have very narrow feet. I'm 127lbs, , not overweight, and they don't fit. they are painful to wear.The rest of the "sock" is made of thin flimsy material, like thin tights you would wear with a dress, not supportive. The only thing I like about these is the color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for the pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: having injured my foot last weekend, i spent the entire week in pain, unable to do any kind of workout. i read reviews for a lot of compression sleeves and ended up ordering these which arrived last night (super fast shipping, thank you!). i put them on immediately and ended up sleeping in them. this morning i put one on my injured foot and went to the gym. without the sleeve there's no way i could have done anything but i was able to go through a full weightlifting class with no pain. admittedly i favored the foot a bit, but the sleeve was entirely responsible for my mobility and i'm very grateful for the relief!
customer_reviews.author: Olga G.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve suffered with excruciating pain in the soles of my feet for about 7yrs now. The only things that helped minimally were analgesic and elevating my feet at night. Since I started using the compression socks, my feet feel amazing. It gives my flat feet great support without cutting off my circulation, they are soft and very comfortable. I’ll definitely will be getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Little Lady

customer_reviews.title: I have several pair that work well but Compression Z is one of the best. I would definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.text: I developed Plantar Fasciitis a year ago. I've tried night splints (I have 3 of them)I've tried a walking boot from a Podiatrist, Physical Therapy, home exercises, ice, custom orthotics and the list goes on. The only thing that has give me relief has been Foot Sleeves. I have several pair that work well but Compression Z is one of the best. I would definitely recommend them. The fit is nice and snug around the ankle and supports the arch very well. I need the support in the arch and ankle to relieve the pain.
customer_reviews.author: BJI

customer_reviews.title: these are well made and to a very nice job support-wise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to help support my ankle and foot after bunion surgery. I wear a women's size 10, so according to the size chart, I needed a size medium. For foot length, that works, but these are tight around the ankle and no matter what, I can't get them to stretch. I have little ankles and where the top of this meets my calf, my measurement is only 9". Once my ankle starts to swell, it cuts off my circulation. The manufacturer should provide sizing info for the ankle and foot diameter. Otherwise, these are well made and to a very nice job support-wise.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN S.

customer_reviews.title: CompressionZ does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I love my CompressionZ! They absolutely do what they are supposed to. The fit is perfect and I have no trouble getting them on. My feet don't hurt like they used to, in fact, I hardly know that they are bothersome at all. That is awesome because just a few weeks ago I couldn't stand, sit, walk, without pain. There is nothing negative to say about my CompressionZ. In fact, I love mine so much that I have ordered 2 more pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Risner

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: On June 29, 2019 I purchased a pair of these Socks... They were so comfortable and effective that I ordered another 2 pairs on August 27,2019.. Both pairs were completely different!! They were not as soft and were extremely uncomfortable!! Imfeel like this was a bait and switch scam. The only thing that was the same was the writing on the Socks. I ordered another pair hoping that the same ones I received on June 30, 2019 I will receive again. VERY Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: These really worked for me - instantly
customer_reviews.text: First time in my life that I ever experienced plantar fasciitis - the deep pain and limits to my movements. I tried ice, insoles and bought a few other products but nothing helped at all. I was skeptical, but decided to try these compression sleeves. They did the trick instantly - the design of these sleeves distributed the pressure and reduced my pain almost completely. I'm truly amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Regal

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are so stuff and scratchy. They are more like a brace then a sock. So uncomfortable I could not wear them for long. They dug into my skin even though they were the right size and did not seem tight. It is the kind of material they are and how they are made. I have others that feel more like and sick and have the same support. They did not hold up after washing either. They curl and become stiffer. I didn’t even feel like I was getting support after putting my poor feet thru all that too.
customer_reviews.author: Karol G

customer_reviews.title: they're great
customer_reviews.text: I live in the deep south, so wearing compression hose is unbearable most of the year. I noticed that often the swelling was confined to the upper foot and ankle, so I tried to give socks a try. The first time I put these on I was sold. They were comfortable, compressed the area that needed compressing and came in fun colors. There are still times when I have to wear the hose, but for those days where the swelling has localized I have a cool alternative.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: A Supportive Alternative
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing these fitted sleeves, I hadi been usng a support wrap around my foot to support my arch & take the pressure off the plantar. These sleeves accomplish nearly the same thing, but they don’t bunch or roll-up inside your sock or shoe. I can wear them all day without any discomfort. They provide secure, comfortable support to my foot while giving my issues some chances to heal. I’m very pleased with these foot sleeves & can confidently recommened them to anyone having plantar fasciitis issues.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great for swelling & pain of the feet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchase these compression socks. Didn't realize they had different colors which I like very much. They are comfortable; I experience no pain what-so-ever when I walk and prevents my feet from swelling. If I don't wear them they will swell up. Excellent purchase, excellent quality and will continue to purchase them when the need arises. Recommend these compression socks highly. Shipping & delivery excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Cautious Buyer

customer_reviews.title: These are to tight for me
customer_reviews.text: Although they are good quality I found them to be to tight all around - at the cuff and on the foot. I wear size 10 m. women's shoes and I have bought multiple brands of the foot sleeves offered on Amazon and every one of them are to tight for my foot - no matter which size I by. I am feeling pretty disappointed not only with these but with every other brands I have purchased here.
customer_reviews.author: Karie

customer_reviews.title: Allowed me to move during my sprained foot.
customer_reviews.text: I sprained my foot dodging a wasp, long story, I was recovering for 3 weeks and these compression socks were the only thing that allowed me to move during my recovery stage. And I was able to walk around the house and basically not lay in bed all day long. I bought my parents some too because they work in their garden alot because they sell vegetables at a farmer's market and they wear these while gardening and feel like they haven't been on rough uneven ground all day.
customer_reviews.author: Xo Cha

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Soft, comfortable material Cons - Only light pressure - After wearing only 3 times it looks like the material on the heel is fraying - Fits weird under regular socks. As you put socks on over the foot sleeves, they roll up. So instead of being smooth all over, they form circular lump around the middle of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Meldrum

customer_reviews.title: These run very, very small! Nice once you get the size right!
customer_reviews.text: These run very, very small! I had trouble getting the seller to exchange for a large, so Amazon refunded me and I ordered a large. I have a very, very narrow size 7 foot. I got a medium and it was wayyyyy too tight! Yes, I have a badly sprained foot and ankle. Still, now that it is nearly healed, I still get some swelling, as I am on my feet all day long. The large is just right and gives me the support and compression I need! Very nice quality and it has not stretched out but a tiny bit, daily use for 3 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Gingercook

customer_reviews.title: Great compression, Nice fit, wish they they had the beige color.
customer_reviews.text: the compression socks worked as I expected very nice fit. I had really wanted the Beige but had to settle for the nude color, which I do not like as much. That is the reason I gave 4 stars. I also purchased a pair for my daughter in nude. she thought that they were a good fit and will wear them for work. When I had ordered CompressionZ socks my daughter was home when I received them. She loves them, and wears them after work. By mistake she put them in the wash, she air dried and the cam out great!
customer_reviews.author: xani

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6' 4" and I highly recommend this to my tall friends out there
customer_reviews.text: Normally I suffer from severe pains due to standing for too long or from excessive walking. After purchasing these and using them along with a pair of Dr Scholl's inserts for plantar fasciitis, I have found that my discomfort levels have fallen drastically. I was recently able to walk 18km through the streets of Manhattan (yes 18km) and not have the usual symptoms that us tall, flat footed people suffer from. I'm 6' 4" and I highly recommend this to my tall friends out there. Hope this review helps. You can wear it over your socks with no issue and with no major sweating issues.
customer_reviews.author: LegacyGTS

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and Correction of Plantar Fasciitis foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Great Support. Helps comfort and correct and avoid plantar fasciitis foot pain. Also, great customer service. I ordered a pair awhile back and loved them so I ordered another pair in black. When the order came in, I only had one sock. Amazon worked with seller and sent a pair of socks. Thanks so much for the ease in handling this initial disappointment! Keep making great socks!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Feel Good-But Not a Panacea
customer_reviews.text: Along with stretching, a night splint, ice, arch supports, steroid injections, ball massages and NSAIDs (naproxen) these socks seem to help. Over the last four months my plantar fasciitis seems to be improving. Nothing is a panacea for p.f., as I'm sure many would concur. I wear these socks pretty much all the time. They are especially good if you are accustomed to walking around the house in your stocking feet and therefore need arch support. I only need one "sleeve" so the pair allows you to wash one and wear the other. They do feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: These rock!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! They are working! Not a 100% "I am healed!" experience, but I am better! The first day I put these on, I was amazed. I could get up and start walking without having to stand there and get my breath due to the heal pain. Now, there is still some, but nothing compared to what I had. Even getting up in the morning is tons better!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG they actually help
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty bad edema that makes it hard to walk more than a block or two. I tried full-leg compression socks before and found them profoundly uncomfortable -- legs & feet felt like they were being overrun by a zillion metal spiders. So I was skeptical about these. But they really do help, A LOT, and after a while I don't even notice they're there. Needless to say I'll be ordering more. Will update this review if my opinion changes after extended use and laundering.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Return Customer
customer_reviews.text: As a person with very high arches, the CompressionZ Plantar Fasciitis Socks give me much needed support and eliminate the pain I get in my right foot when I’m on my feet all day. I have purchased a total 4 pair over the last 2 years. That way I have a fresh pair to wear each day between washings. If these socks hadn’t performed as promised, I would have only purchased the first pair! Small investment for solving an aching problem.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Potts

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A RELIEF AFTER 21 YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 9 screws and 2 plates in my right heel from an accident for 21 years. I have extreme pain and swelling after standing or walking for even a short time until I found these foot sleeves. I put one on regularly when doing work outside, standing, or walking. It is very comfortable and the compression keeps the swelling down and most importantly no pain! Thanks compressionz!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These helped my foot pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having foot pain, especially in the balls of my feet, since I injured my hip. I thought I would try these socks to see if they might help. They made it much more comfortable to be on my feet for hours at a time. I think it’s the combination of support & compression that really helps my pain. I am going to buy several more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lunde

customer_reviews.title: Saved me on a hiking trip!
customer_reviews.text: These saved me on a trip to Peru! With two months to go before a strenuous hike on the Inca Trail in Peru to see Machu Picchu, I was diagnosed with stress fractures of the 4th and 5th metatarsals (from hiking in Scandinavia). I had to go non-weight bearing for 6 weeks then had about 3 weeks before our Peru hike. My foot didn't feel quite right after being off of it for 6 weeks so I bought these for compression and support. They immediately made my foot feel better and I am happy to report I completed the grueling hike to Machu Picchu without pain - something that I didn't think would be possible. Highly recommend for stress fractures!
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Kristi

customer_reviews.title: I feel CompressionZ has the best support but as the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: I have had plantar fasciitis twice in my right foot, and now in my left foot. First time I have tried the foot sleeves. I order this brand, and another brand. I feel CompressionZ has the best support but as the picture shows, they are very long (negative for me, and I am a women's 9). These work great! With it being summer, I have not worn them a few times and foot pain increases almost immediately. My pain hasn't cleared up completely, but these make a huge difference. I was able to enjoy a week at Disney theme parks wearing these, and my favorite orthopedic sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with heel pain for years. These came in the mail so I didn’t get them until after work. As soon as I put them on I felt so much better. I have worn them many times since. I stand all day at work, and when I wear compressionz sleeves, my feet are not as tired at the end of day. They are good quality material and are comfortable. It’s like wearing a pair of socks so I wear mine with very thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great design and material; but if you have a big foot, size 14 and over, I cannot recommen them.
customer_reviews.text: I think all manufacturers of compression socks, both ankle and long socks, must go back to the drawing board for those who were 14 or larger. Most of us will be between 6-2 and 6-6. Unless we weigh 180 or less, we have larger ankles and legs. Maybe some out there make compression materials for taller men but I have been unable to find them. I can wear them for 4 hours and they are great; but any longer I must take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo R. Baca

customer_reviews.title: Really helped me conquer Plantar Fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: I let my PF go one for almost 2 years before I decided I had to find a fix. There were many things I did - but these socks allowed me to get up in the morning with almost no pain. Mostly I wore them at night and I wore compression socks during the day; but in the summer, I found that wearing these under short socks with shorts and they worked really well. These worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Claim ... but No Follow-Through
customer_reviews.text: These did nothing for me. I have wide feet and felt the light compression would feel good... and hoped they would help my plantar fasciitis. I ordered IAW the fitting guidelines. Unfortunately, they only felt like socks with the toes cut out. I honestly don't think a smaller size would feel any different. Save your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: New and downgraded!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn CompressionZ plantar fasciitis socks for years now. The pairs I have previously have been perfect, but the finally wore out and holes are getting ripped into them. I know they work and my feet feel better, so I didn’t want to switch brands.... but contrary to the image presented the socks sent to me are not as depicted. The compression is noticably less (comparable to standard athletic socks). Which is an issue with my painful feet. If you look at photos, my old sock (photo right) has much more supportive stitching and resembles the product depicted. The new sock (photo left) is more stretchy and contains far less of the important stictching.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: provides SO much relief, it's ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I lived without these for the last 8 months. working kitchens = standing up all day/night & even with work shoes & insoles, my feet can get very fatigued- especially when clopening. when I have to work past midnight & hop out of bed in the morning for an opening shift, my feet kill me by the afternoon. these have helped so much in conjunction with a proper pair of insoles. tl;dr if you stand on your feet all day, these work great! pair them with some good insoles and you'll never worry about burning/sore feet again.
customer_reviews.author: kasha

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it really helps my feet. I bought several other compression socks from other companies trying to find some that worked like these do but for a cheaper price. my attempt at saving money ended up costing a lot of money and a waste of time because they all sucked. I spent around $700 on other socks, shoes, inserts, creams, massagers, foot baths, and other misc stuff. this product is the only thing that helped me. definitely worth the money. they are very friendly also. was very helpful with a question I had. I already ordered more and will do so again in the future
customer_reviews.author: ADAM SPENDING MONEY

customer_reviews.title: A sleeve that works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because my feet have been killing me for a while, but were especially bad last week. I've tried sleeves in the past, but only a cheap pair from Walmart with unsatisfactory results. These, however, are far more effective! I still have some trouble walking around when I first get up, but I can tell my feet are healing. And they're so comfortable! I'd wear them with shoes if I could, though they tend to fold back near the toes when I put on socks. Still good enough to walk in when home and relaxing, so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: For edema
customer_reviews.text: The first day they seemed to be effective in reducing edema to my ankles, which is what I wanted. However, they tend to ride up on the foot. I tried wearing them with and without socks to see if either would reduce the riding up. Neither did. Finally, after wearing them three days, the edema seemed to transfer to my lower foot below where the elastic brace ended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Petuskey

customer_reviews.title: I feel like Goldilocks!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like Goldilocks! Other foot sleeves I have tried were either too loose or too tight...these are just right. I was hesitant to buy another pair but people from my Plantar Fascitis support group raved about them. So glad I got them. Usually, at the end of a long day on my feet, I would come home and ice them. Got some relief from the ice, but it was rather temporary. The relief from these socks is immediate and longer lasting! Even when I take them off, my pain is about 80% diminished.I wear a size 61/2 to 7 shoe and got the Medium sock. Heaven! Thank for an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: These really help!
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my husband who has swelling in his feet along with discomfort. He wasn't having much success with elevating his feet so I took a chance and ordered these without consulting him. He loved them from the moment he tried them on, and he reports having much more comfortable feet because of them. I'm glad I got them! He doens't want to be without them every again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Did not help my plantar fasciitus, but may help for other foot issues
customer_reviews.text: This compression foot sleeve did not solve my plantar fasciitus pain, but the sleeve was comfortable and did not do any harm. Bottom line: I did not have any miraculous pain-relief. However, I did have miraculous pain-relief after one night's use of a ProCare DorsiWedge night splint. That, together with an off-the-shelf orthotic insert and the Sketcher brand rolling heel Shape-Up shoes gave me huge pain relief. The final "cure" was from one steroid injection. Now, after 6 months of pain, the pain has disappeared. The foot sleeves may help for other foot pain issues or for tired feet, but I did not see any pain relief for my plantar fasciitus.
customer_reviews.author: Niles508

customer_reviews.title: Don't Wait if You're in Pain
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that compression socks could bring so much relief from plantar fasciitis. I am a size 9 wide shoe and the medium is a perfect fit. I felt pain relief the minute I put them on. The graduated compression is fantastic. The manufacturer provides additional information on using the socks via email after your purchase. I'm going to order a second pair so I can alternate them for washing. Meanwhile, I am wearing them during the working day and again at night and my feet are thanking me. I walk back and forth to work, so staying off my feet is not an option. So glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Perkins

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with foot pain for some time. I've seen doctors, had orthotics made and done stretching exercises ... nothing worked. I couldn't wait for these compression sleeves to be delivered, I've been wearing them for about 5 hours and my feet feel terrific. I'll be doing a lot of walking tomorrow, If they continue to work this well, I'll be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: KMiller

customer_reviews.title: I Needed These!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a lot of foot pain at night, making it impossible to sleep. I have plantar fasciitis. So I ordered these foot sleeves. They were a little hard to get on at first, but so worth it! They gave me relief at night and I didn't wear them during the day. In a short time my feet were so I didn't need them at night any more! (But I keep them by the bed if I do!) Better than sleeping with the awkward boots because I tend to sleep on my stomach. I definitely recommend them if you're having issues. Yes, they feel tight. Yes, they are a little hard to pull on. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Help with Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a couple of weeks now, and they seem to be helping with my plantar fasciitis, especially those first few steps in the morning. The only reason I'm giving them three stars is because they are a little too snug across the arch of my foot, which is somewhat uncomfortable (and I bought the largest size). So, if you have big/wide feet, these may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalScott

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pairs as I was unsure of what size would fit my husband. The size that ended up fitting, he said he had to take it off because it was so uncomfortable. He’s worn socks like this before but this one he did not like at all. And on top of it. I went to return the size that didn’t fit and it’s saying this vendor doesn’t accept returns. But it doesn’t say anywhere that they don’t. Beware of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Saved by feet! I can attest to the effectiveness ...
customer_reviews.text: Saved by feet! I can attest to the effectiveness of this product. 4 of my fellow security guards can as well. After the first night of wearing these I had to tell the rest of the gang. I can say that the pain in my right foot has decreased from constant pain to occasional pain. I'm going to say that I'm at about 25% pain remaining. That may be a little low, but it is a huge drop. I even wore one with wet shoes on so I could take my nephew to a water park. I may have winched twice during the day instead of limping and being in constant pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size to small
customer_reviews.text: I bought size large because someone recommended that it was the right size but when I tried to put it on they were to small and tied for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena garrido

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Not effective for Plantar Fasciitis pain.. good for edema
customer_reviews.text: Quality fabric expect it will wear well... Good general compression for edema - swelling and lite support to ankle . Unfortunately not much support for the arch for Plantar Fasciitis... The support is too general and not tight on the arch as needed.. I wanted a nice beige since the other pair I have that works very well is black I spend the extra $ expecting these to work as well... Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Malia S

customer_reviews.title: Housekeeping Supervisor Swollen Ankles
customer_reviews.text: I am a big/ tall woman at a large hospital who wears them daily.. I walk alot and my ankle do not swell up when I wear them. If I don't wear them my ankles swell up. I have noticed this and I order me another pair. I also ordered a pair for co worker a pair who has the same problem with her ankles.. I am in love with them and they are comfortable. They do compress and so far after 2 months wearing them..
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: great support
customer_reviews.text: This compression sleeve is really a great product for it's purpose. It provides the right amount of support for my ankle, but not so tight that it cuts off circulation. And it doesn't slip off or down my foot. It just works really well and so far has held together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are okay, BEWARE most likely won't be able to return them if you buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife as she sprained her ankle and wanted a compression sock for work. They didn't provide the support she wanted & when we went to return them it said they're not eligible for return even though we got them through prime. So BEWARE you most likely won't be able to return them if you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great relief...a really good buy
customer_reviews.text: I am loving these compression socks. I have both Plantar Fasciitis and varicose veins, and these socks have given me a great deal of relief in just a few days of wearing them. They are thin enough to wear in my regular shoes, but they also provide excellent support as I walk around my house without shoes (yes, I know that's a no-no for Plantar Fasciitis...I'm a rebel). I will be buying more soon so that I don't have to launder them each night.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with plantar fasciitis for several months now. I'm a tennis players and have custom supports for my shoes. These 'socks' feel great on, offer 'added' support and I believe help my PF. They are not a cure but they do help. I recently went to Europe and wore them the entire time. We walked a lot and not only did they help the PF they also helped to keep the blisters away! Fast delivery and good value. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Tate

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great for the gym or every day wear. I’ve had Achilles isssues and they help me feel less pain before, after and during a workout. By no means will they cure a serious injury but they are a fantastic addition to therapy and rest as they help stabilize the joints and keep swelling at bay. I’ll be buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Nick M

customer_reviews.title: these socks are great!
customer_reviews.text: The socks are fantastic! I now own 3 pairs and I plan to order more. They feel good when wearing them. I usually wear them under my regular socks. I love that these go up past my ankles but not all the way to my knees. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but works in tight shoes
customer_reviews.text: It does seem to help ease heel pain but the pain doesn't totally disappear. They get stretched out over time and not quite as tight as when I had them new. I guess I should get a smaller size? However, they fit well in tight shoes whereas the bands I have are too thick. Still, I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: cocofan

customer_reviews.title: NO COMPRESSION
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a medium. There is no more compression with these then I get in some snug fitting socks. The shocker is that the seller does not allow this item to be returned. I am a 9.5 women, normal looking feet, the medium was recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Lose tention quickly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Fit as expected. Worked as expected for about a day. Then, they lost tension. They're equivalent to most other sleeves. They don't stay tight for long. Wouldn't recommend for someone who wants relief from a serious case of fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrad

customer_reviews.title: Pain free immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have had foot/ankle pain for years. I’ve had surgery for heel spurs and plantar fasciitis. I’m a retired police officer and I’ve worked on my feet for years! I’m a veterinarian technician now and am still on my feet. I have orthotics in my shoes. When I decided to try these compression socks, it was really a last resort. As soon as I put them on, I felt relief immediately! They are so comfortable, I forget I’m wearing them! I’ve already recommended them to numerous friends! A great product and well worth the cost! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tac

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but good compression
customer_reviews.text: These fit snugly, do a good job of compression. I can wear them all day, every day and they are comfortable. Provide good support to ease plantars fascitis. I bought these compression 'socks' at the recommendation of my physiotherapist. I am so pleased with the easing of the plantar fasciitis pain, and recommend them to anyone. The can only help.
customer_reviews.author: valmur

customer_reviews.title: Helped reduce swelling on top of my foot.
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. You can see the compression bands in darker brown, but there is elastic throughout the sock and enough across the top of the foot to help reduce swelling there. Plenty large enough. Compression is just right--not too tight. Sock is not too difficult to get on. The band at the top of the sock is not tight and does not bind, but still holds its place and does not slide down.
customer_reviews.author: I Do The Speed LimitTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: These do as promised!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I had developed severe heel and arch/instep pain in both my feet and decided to try these. They are very tight when trying to put them on and can be a little tricky if you can't bend easily to reach your feet but once they're on...wow...are they comfortable! It feels like your feet are being hugged! There was no problem with constriction of the circulation in my feet. Within two days, all the pain in my feet was gone. They definitely live up to their advertisement!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfortable, easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I bought these foot sleeves after I hurt my ankle. I used them for a long trip abroad where I knew I was going to do a lot of walking. They are super comfortable, easy to wash, and provided all the support I needed while wearing flip flops or my Keens in a humid/hot environment. Now I've begun to wear them while training for a half marathon. I love the extra support these little sleeves provide. I will definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Deb D

customer_reviews.title: it works way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Arch pain started to afflict me very bad; used plantars without much results. An athlet friend told me that chiropractors benadage the feet for this type of pain, so I thought that compression socks could help; I tried another type that would not help much and then I found these ones: I am amazed... they WAY BETTER and FASTER than I expected! Whenever I wear them, I do not feel any pain, that unfortunately returns when I do not wear them even if not so strong. I bought them in 3 colors...can not wear them with fashion shoes, but they make any sneaker look great! Highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: caribshopper

customer_reviews.title: They are a great company that stands by their product!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. Great support but they started to unravel and now its just slowly falling apart. Update: They replaced them with no hassel! They truly stand by their product and I am very happy with the replacement. They have great customer service and I am pleased with the replacement. Thank you! They have geat customer service. I am very pleased with the service and p
customer_reviews.author: L. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: good compression, don'strangle my ankles
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered about $500 worth of compression socks trying to find some that fit around my mutant ankles (I blame the gene pool) without cutting off the circulation, but are tight enough for good compression and not too long for my feet. Good compression, well-made, reasonable price. Much cheaper than liposuction.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: So happy I own these
customer_reviews.text: So happy I own these. They are snug, but it's not bothersome for me. They are compression socks so they are meant to fit that way. The only times I've had to put a small effort into getting them on was when my feet were already swollen. I developed plantar fasciitis from triathlon training and just bad genes. These really sooth my tired feet. I've noticed my swollen ankles are back to normal after wearing the socks to bed. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WorthyWildCat

customer_reviews.title: I like these okay, but they're not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I am an older person, with fluid retention and plantar fasciitis, that likes to wear flip-flops. They have good compression, and are easy to put on and take off. The band at the top was more narrow than I would like, which meant that as my ankles swelled, I got the "rubber band" constriction feeling and had to take them off. They were good for 6 to 8 hours before they got uncomfortable though. They wash up nice, and dry fairly quickly. If your only problem is plantar fasciitis, I think these work well. If you have swelling ankles like I do, I prefer a sleeve with a wider top band.
customer_reviews.author: oucat5

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of Foot Sleeves after spraining my ankle. My marathon-running cousin recommended them as he is knowledgeable about sports injuries, having had a good number of foot issues himself. Instead of re-wrapping the ankle with tape, I put on the foot sleeves and found them nicely supportive and comfortable. They gave me just enough compression on the ankle. Since I have also suffered from plantar fasciitis in the past, I'll be getting the benefit of that aspect as well. Other ankle supports didn't look comfortable in terms of fitting inside my shoes. The Foot Sleeves are thin enough that they fit perfectly. I've ordered 3 more pairs and I intend to wear them most days.
customer_reviews.author: June Rose

customer_reviews.title: Ease Plantar Fasciitis pain.
customer_reviews.text: Have searched all over the internet that could help ease my pain with plantar fasciitis. Saw the reviews on this item and decided to purchased. I wear the compression socks once I get home from work and after walking over 30K steps a day. While it has not eliminated all of my pain, I can say that it has "ease" it considerably. I fee that my pain has gone down by 50%. I ordered a small size - since I wear a 6 1/2 shoe and it fit comfortable but a little snug. Better to be snug than loose in my opinion. I only wear them for 30-60 minutes and I am good to go.
customer_reviews.author: PKittrell

customer_reviews.title: THESE WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a posterior tibialis tendon tear. I was told that I may have to wear one of those horrible boots. The orthopedist allowed me to experiment with these socks. THEY ARE WORKING!! Thanks so much! The pain and swelling has come down to almost normal. I tried a more expensive brand and they were not as nice as these. These wash well and hold their elasticity. I've been wearing them for a month. Anezka
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Sebek

customer_reviews.title: These help!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to write a review on the CompressionZ Socks. These help me so much! I purchased them mainly to use as a ankle support as I have had over the years, 2 broken ankles, many fractures and too many to count sprains! My ankles are weak and with every shoe I wear I am terrified of falling. These give me the ankle support I need and also seem to help my knees with their pain. I can 100% recommend these and I am now wearing them everyday. I feel dumb that I didn't order something like this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: KaraN

customer_reviews.title: Odd Fitting
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6.5 - 7 W in women's sneakers, so I ordered the Medium based on the recommendation (wide feet, order up.) Unfortunately, I found these to be odd fitting - they covered my foot almost to the toes. The compression cut off the circulation to my toes, yet did not offer enough compression to my plantar fascia, which is where I needed it. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks because of foot pain along with ankle pain due to arthritis. I like the compression feel and it starts helping immediately upon putting on. Would be nice if these socks had trigger points that would work on nerves going into the legs making leg pain better. The first pair was purchased for my wife,she liked them so much two more pairs were ordered for her and i also purchased a pair for myself because they had helped my wife . my feet don't feel tired from being on them all day.
customer_reviews.author: William Moon

customer_reviews.title: Not for small feet! Fabric isn’t durable.
customer_reviews.text: Not so sure about these. They feel a bit loose on me, yet the fabric seems like it’s going to tear near the heel. I just wore them for 5 hours and there’s no indentions (like other compression socks make) and my foot still hurt. I don’t think this brand is well made not for a small foot.i was expecting them to be as good as my other socks but they weren’t. Thirty 48 socks are a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tanich2uTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort but what is really spectacular is the durability
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these almost 24/7 since I received them. Amazing comfort but what is really spectacular is the durability. Wearing them through three days of Hurricane Hermine, got my shoes off so I don't ruin them walking around in 6-8 inches of water for three days with nothing on but these sleeves and they look like they just came out of the package. The only thing I would change is I would put two pairs in a package so you can swap them out when you need to toss em in the washer. Definitely will be grabbing another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H Bass

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality if you order multiple pairs.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of these and was very happy with the quality and fit so I used the “order again” option to get a second pair. The second pair was like a completely different pair of socks. They were longer, different print of brand name, and slightly different material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: helpful for swelling
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found these. They're helpful for keeping swelling of ankles and feet down. They're pretty comfortable and supportive. Wearing them when I have to sit for long periods makes my edema less uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic find for my feet!
customer_reviews.text: "These items now make 3 that I own. They work as promised. I received a personal note from the seller. As a dog show judge I stand on concrete up to 12 hours. I have broken bones in my foot. The sleeves prevent swelling, and extreme pain that I normally have. I recommend that if you are considering buying sleeves definitely consider these."
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Postpartum necessity
customer_reviews.text: After I was induced with my daughter I had horrible swelling. My feet were so swollen they were sore to touch and walk. After wearing these for a couple days, the swelling went down and the water weight dispersed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a second pair that we bought and as you can see it’s two different sizes. The longer one was the previous one and the small one is the newer one. My husband ankles are swollen and he new socks don’t fit him. It’s the same size but for some reason they are super small now. We are very disappointed with the new one. We love the first pair hat we bought but not the new small ones that were delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Plantar Fasciitis GONE!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or fourth pair of CompressionZ socks. I've worn them for three or four years now. On first thing in the morning so I wear them during my morning walk in the hills, then off late afternoon. These - combined with shoes which offer solid support - I have not had any Plantar fasciitis pain in years. They work!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Erhardt

customer_reviews.title: Not great if you're looking for ankle compression.
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like this product, however I ended up returning them. I suffer from Lymphedema from an old angle injury and I've tried MANY compression socks over the years. I keep searching for something that is more "fashionable" and gave these a try. I felt the quality of the socks themselves was really poor (loose threads, uneven stitching etc), but the compression was really disappointing. I felt like they had little to no compression at the ankle where I expected it. I'm sticking with my medical compression tube stocking till I find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Riley McMuscle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, comfortable foot support
customer_reviews.text: Great foot support if you have tired feet or foot problems, especially post-surgery. I'm recovering from a total foot reconstruction after a Lizfranc break. This sleeve helps keep swelling down and makes my foot feel so much better. I love the nude color - all the others are black or white or other obvious colors. I can put this one on and still look good. If you have foot or ankle problems, this is what you need. Great support for walking, running or any activity or sport. Thin enough to wear under socks.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA BOOTH

customer_reviews.title: Can wear year round...even with summer sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these compression sleeves. I''m a runner and had both feet operated on within the past 9 months. I'm tired of wearing "sensible shoes and was looking forward to wearing sandals this summer, but swelling and numbness were getting in the way. These compression sleeves solved the problem. Because of the color,I can wear them with summer shoes and, best of all, have helped the swelling and numbness. They're thin enough that I've worn them as I've started running again. I will buy more products from CompressionZ.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: This sock helped me with my heal pain when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This sock helped me with my heal pain when I had to be on my feet all day and also when I drove in the car for many hours. I will say the only negative I found was that the amount of pressure the sock held was much less within a few hours of wearing and never really regained the initial compression again. My heal pain is intermittent and not severe, I am not sure how this would work for someone with a more severe condition
customer_reviews.author: TAE

customer_reviews.title: Socks From Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: These socks have saved my life!!! I've had two surgeries for heel spurs and plantar issues. I realized that the socks I wore had to as important as the shoes. I tried these and I will never be without them again! They have made a HUGE difference! I am on my feet all day and I don't know how I could do it without these fine socks! Many many thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Husslein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: The CompressionZ was an great buy. The socks were very comfortable and very easy to put on. I ware a size 8 1/2 - 9 shoe size and I ordered a medium, great fit. The price was very good also.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Helped my ongoing plantar fasciitis pain
customer_reviews.text: These socks really helped my plantar fasciitis pain. I tried heel cups first but they didn't help. The only thing with these socks is that you can only wear them once before washing them and wearing them again. I guess the compression stretches out with just one day of use, but once you wash them they will start working aagin. So I am planning on buying a few more pairs so I have enough to get me through the week.
customer_reviews.author: N.F.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, some relief.
customer_reviews.text: These really seemed to help my planters fasciitis. I tried wearing them all day and all night, but it seemed to help me more when I just wore them in the evening and night and not all day at work. They weren’t a miracle cure, but I do get some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Dana

customer_reviews.title: Like the compression
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I injured my foot hiking, and it has been swollen and painful for more than a week. I couldn't find my old pair, so I ordered a new set, and after one day in the compression sleeve, there is significant improvement in the swelling and pain I was feeling. I like these so much, I bought a pair for my mom for Mother's Day after she told me she was suffering from foot pain. Wear these almost every night after working on my feet all day (teacher). Really helps my foot feel relaxed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Glover

customer_reviews.title: Keep exercising. This will halp.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 66 and just got a Fitbit. I've been doing really well and have lost 30 pounds since late December. But 10,000 steps a day started causing me a lot of foot pain. I went to shoe stores, outdoor stores, athletic stores, and drug stores looking for something that would protect my feet during my workouts. I saw these on Amazon and decided to give it a try. They worked! I'm walking 16-20 thousand steps a day now. My feet are tired sometimes, but they don't hurt anymore. We are on the road again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: They do the job, but not sure they'll last very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these one month ago and have used them about half of the days since. They do definitely help with my plantar fasciitis and other ankle problems stemming from an old poorly healed talus bone fracture (that later surgery could not improve), but only after a month of moderate use, the edges on the toeless cuff have started to fray and show obvious wear that I would expect from months of use. They still provide a lot of compression but what I paid for these and what they are intended for, I expected a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: A good product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She is a woman who wears a size 8 shoe. The Medium fit her perfectly. I had been wrapping her ankle daily to help prevent it from hurting when she walks. These socks worked better than my wraps. She said she has been able to resume her normal activities and asked me to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: wwskinn3

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got these compression socks for after my bunion surgery once I got 2 months out. It’s a pretty tight fit but gave great support and also was nice because a lot of the compression socks weren’t long enough to cover the bunion area. These went right to the bottom of the toe and covered the bunion area. Great product?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my compression socks yesterday and tried it on today. It fits comfortably, not much compression though. I am size 9.5. I ordered the large. Stitching quality is substandard. The stitching is coming apart already on both socks by the heel and ankle area. Unfortunately this is a non-returnable item. However, Amazon was fantastic with their customer service on issuing a full refund. To the seller, I will gladly return the socks to you if you provide a shipping label.
customer_reviews.author: P. C.

product_meta.title: CompressionZ Plantar Fasciitis Socks - Compression Foot Sleeves - Ankle Brace Arch Support - Pain Relief for Heel Spurs, Edema, Achilles Tendonitis
feature_bullets: RELIEVE FOOT PAIN FAST: Compression foot wrap delivers foot, arch, heel, & ankle compression for max pain relief. Ideal foot & ankle pressure for plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, tendonitis & more.
REDUCE SWELLING & STABILIZE ANKLE: Ankle compression brace helps reduce pain & swelling in joints, muscles, and tendons while protecting & stabilizing foot to reduce chance of re-injury.

COMFORTABLE ALL-DAY WEAR: Plantar fasciitis socks are moisture wicking for all-day comfort. Wear with orthotics, shoe inserts, or a night splint for max recovery. Fits comfortably under regular socks.
RECOVER FASTER: Compression ankle sleeve boosts circulation to speed recovery times. It's the perfect lightweight foot wrap support to reduce pain & recover quicker.
PERFECT FOR ACTIVE LIFESTYLES: Our toeless compression sock can be worn while exercising, running, jumping, and offers comfortable foot support to reduce inflammation, while providing pain relief.
